description: This file defines the Product entity class for a Java-based backend application, mapping to a 'products' table in the database. It includes fields for id, name, price, quantity, createdAt, and updatedAt, with appropriate validation constraints and JPA annotations for persistence.

classes.name: Product
classes.description: Entity class representing a product with fields for id, name, price, quantity, createdAt, and updatedAt, including lifecycle hooks for timestamp management.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets 'createdAt' and 'updatedAt' to current timestamp when the entity is first persisted.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Updates 'updatedAt' to current timestamp before the entity is updated.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the product was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of the last update.
